nodes.text: Sirocco Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic. Sirocco Squadron were known to strike swiftly and with precision, and often vanished as quickly as they appeared.
Sirocco Squadron's starfighters were painted orange with light gray markings/stripes.
Sirocco Squadron was one of the multiplayer starfighter cosmetic options in the 2020 game Star Wars: Squadrons.
